title: ESYO Summer Tour 2026: Join Us Across Europe!
body:
From July 19 to August 9, 2026, the European Spirit of Youth Orchestra (ESYO) embarks on its exciting Summer Tour 2026, titled “UNITED TOGETHER – 2026.” This year’s tour will feature concerts in Italy, Slovenia, Austria, and Croatia, bringing together talented young musicians from across Europe and beyond, united by music and friendship.
Concert dates and details will be available online soon – stay tuned to our website for the full schedule and join us on this unforgettable musical journey across Europe!
P.S. Auditions for the 2026 season are now open until March 31, 2026. Apply today via the Auditions page on our website!

title: New Audition 2026/27 Season Announced
body: We are pleased to announce the opening of the new audition season, running from December 1, 2025, through March 31, 2026. All young musicians are warmly encouraged to apply via the Auditions page on this website. We look forward to discovering new talent and welcoming the next generation of performers!

title: ESYO Summer Tour 2025: "UNITED TOGETHER – GO! 2025, for a Europe of good friends"
body:
From July 13 to August 3, 2025, the European Spirit of Youth Orchestra (ESYO) sets off on its exciting Summer Tour 2025, proudly titled: "UNITED TOGETHER – GO! 2025, for a Europe of good friends". This year’s tour brings together young musicians from 15 countries, united by music and friendship. Representing the true spirit of Europe—and beyond—our orchestra includes talents from: Romania, Spain, Russian Federation, Serbia, Italy, North Macedonia, Hungary, Germany, Slovenia, Belarus, Poland, Slovakia, Montenegro, Portugal, and China.
Tour dates and concert details are now available online – check out the full schedule right here on our website and join us on this unforgettable musical journey across Europe!
